content: this text is a summary of a legal case that took place in ljubljana the court issued a judgment on november 22 2022 regarding the costs involved in the case the plaintiff incurred costs of 3135 eur which the defendant is responsible for covering the court also made a decision regarding the division of assets including real estate properties and movable items the plaintiff was awarded a 37 share while the defendant received a 63 share the court found that the court of first instance failed to consider the plaintiffs contributions to a coowned property resulting in the defendant being unable to prove their ownership the judgment ordered the defendant to pay the plaintiff 231990 eur which was later increased to 313500 eur the defendant appealed the judgment but the appeal was dismissed the defendant was also ordered to reimburse the plaintiffs costs for the appeal proceedings if the defendant fails to pay within the set time limit they will owe statutory default interest

metadata.CASE_ID: Sodba Višjega sodišča v Ljubljani II Cp 1164/2022, 22. 11. 2022
